etomica.action

Class BoxQuench

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.action.BoxActionAdapter
      • etomica.action.BoxQuench
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoxAction, IAction, java.io.Serializable

    public class BoxQuench
extends BoxActionAdapter
    Scales all velocities of a box so that its kinetic temperature is equal to a given value.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
